Eagle Harbor Golf Club, Fleming Island, FL - Scorecard & Overview Join Now Log In Book a Tee Time Find a Course Learn Equipment Instruction Lifestyle Tour Golf Travel All Articles Resources Find Driving Ranges Find Golf Simulators About Us Find golf lessons Newsletter Join Now Log In Newsletter Search Courses Enter Keyword Home Courses FL Fleming Island Public 4 2 Reviews Eagle Harbor Golf Club Designed by Clyde B. Johnston, ASGCA and opened in 1993 Eagle Harbor - Fleming Island , Florida Course Details Scorecard Flyover Views Yardage Maps Reviews Nearby Courses Course Details Holes: 18 Par: 72 Length: 6840 yards Slope: 141 Rating: 73.4 Driving Ranges: Yes The 18-hole "Eagle Harbor" course at the Eagle Harbor Golf Club facility in Fleming Island , Florida features 6840 yards of golf from the longest tees for a par of 72. The course rating is 73.4 and it has a slope rating of 141. The estimated green fees for 18 holes is $85. Eagle Harbor Golf Club Golf Club has an onsite driving range with 6 practice tees. Designed by Clyde B. Johnston, ASGCA, the Eagle Harbor golf course opened in  1993. Estimated Green Fees $85 These rates are an estimate of what you might expect to pay at Eagle Harbor with a cart. Actual rates may vary. Fees are typically lowest Monday through Thursday and during twilight (late afternoon and evenings). Expect to pay the highest rates on weekends. Get a bird's-eye view of each hole, helping you strategize your round and navigate the course with precision. Eagle Harbor Yardage Maps Plan your shots effectively with our Yardage Maps. Click on the yardage maps for detailed measurements on every hole, including distances to hazards and key landmarks, ensuring you make the right decisions on every swing. Reviewed April 03, 2013 Little bit of everything on this one...sand, water, trees and the occasional back yard.  Well maintained and a great staff!  Got backed up the first few holes but played out ok after that. Read More shaun N. Reviewed August 11, 2010 I've only played during twilight hours but enjoyed the course regardless.  I plan on getting in all 18 soon. Who We Are — Eagle - Design for Golf Skip to Content Open Menu Close Menu Eagle Plus Signage Entrance Car Park & Clubhouse Directional Health & Safety Course Information Golf Services Driving Range Tee Signage Measured Mark Point of Play Markers Fairway Markers Architect Plaques Vintage Print Scorecards Course Guides Bag Tags Green Fee Tickets Pin Positions Club Collateral Branding Course Services Our Work About Us Who We Are Design & Manufacture Sustainability Contact Us 0 0 Open Menu Close Menu Eagle Plus Signage Entrance Car Park & Clubhouse Directional Health & Safety Course Information Golf Services Driving Range Tee Signage Measured Mark Point of Play Markers Fairway Markers Architect Plaques Vintage Print Scorecards Course Guides Bag Tags Green Fee Tickets Pin Positions Club Collateral Branding Course Services Our Work About Us Who We Are Design & Manufacture Sustainability Contact Us 0 0 Eagle Plus Folder: Signage Back Entrance Car Park & Clubhouse Directional Health & Safety Course Information Golf Services Driving Range Tee Signage Measured Mark Point of Play Markers Fairway Markers Architect Plaques Vintage Folder: Print Back Scorecards Course Guides Bag Tags Green Fee Tickets Pin Positions Club Collateral Branding Course Services Our Work Folder: About Us Back Who We Are Design & Manufacture Sustainability Contact Us Who WE ARe With Eagle’s reputation and respect, wealth of experience and know-how, we are the go-to company for any golf club needing industry advice and supplies. We lead by working with a golf club's identity to produce quality solutions and products, however we can ultimately produce and market anything that will help the club. We also offer a range of branding services to help develop and drive forward a club's identity - whether it is a logo refinement or a new logo development and full guidelines. Eagle consistently strives to be the best. We pride ourselves on our first-class service, creativity and range of products that ensure golf clubs look their best, stand out from the rest, and project the true ethos of the club to its members and visitors. All of which will enable the growth of their business. The EAGLE Vision The global leader of premium golf course print, signage and branding solutions SUSTainability Sustainability is more than a priority – it's our commitment… FIND OUT MORE Design & manufacture Eagle is renowned for its high-quality, skilled craftsmanship… FIND OUT MORE TACIT In 2018 Eagle joined forces with Tacit to create a service to the golf course industry that is unmatched anywhere else in the world of golf. Tacit key activities are invested in the design, manufacture and distribution of bespoke golf course equipment. Tacit’s unique vision is to be a growing, caring organisation, striving to achieve better results year on year. They achieve this by blending investment programmes in all business activities, using modern equipment and systems with dedicated, experienced and skilled people in all areas. Who We Are | Eagle's Nest Country Club | Phoenix, MD | Invited × Thank you for visiting our site. Please review our Privacy Policy . We use cookies on our site and collect other information pursuant to our Privacy Policy. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our Privacy Policy and data collection practices. OK Skip to Content Opens in new tab Member Login Benefits Finder Opens in new tab Careers Eagle's Nest Country Club Main Site Navigation Who We Are Golf Amenities Membership Host An Event Join Now Host Event Login - Opens in new tab Menu Who We Are Our Team Calendar Directions & Hours Golf Leagues Coaching & Club Fitting Game On Golf Lessons Crush It! Youth Golf Lessons Golf Course Amenities Racquet Sports Swimming Dining Membership Host An Event Weddings Events Meetings & Corporate Tournaments & Outings Event Rooms Contact Us Opens in new tab Member Login Benefits Finder Opens in new tab Careers Home Who We Are Skip Image Carousel Our Team Calendar Directions & Hours A Treasure Built Over Time Founded in 1969 in the idyllic community of Phoenix, Eagle’s Nest is a private club with an inviting approach to the good life. From virtually every vantage point, sweeping views of Loch Raven Reservoir, towering trees and verdant golfing greens lend an air of majesty to the moment. And with each new experience, it becomes ever clearer that this is where you belong. Schedule A Tour Dawn Redwoods A Tale of Rare Beauty Our Club is home to about 75 dawn redwoods — one of the largest collections outside of China. Once prevalent throughout the Northern Hemisphere, these trees were thought to have become extinct until 1941, when a Chinese forester in the Sichuan province discovered more than 1,000 trees that had somehow survived. The trees at Eagle’s Nest are likely very close descendants of those discovered in China. How did so many of these magnificent trees find their way to Eagle’s Nest? According to Jimmy Watson, our first club president, his brother Bobby is to thank. “A nursery in York, PA, wanted to clear an area,” Jimmy explained. “So they said to Bobby, ‘Take ’em all … $1 apiece.’ They were the size of a broom handle. My brother and Roy Albin planted all the trees after work.” With that small investment roughly a half-century ago, another priceless attribute of Eagle’s Nest was born. "Glad I chose the Club for this event...Management and Chef's execution exceeded my expectations. Bar service excellent and the wait and service staff were also wonderful. As it should have been...it was a fun and comfortable night for me, my family and our guests" Patrick Ellis Regional General Manager Contact Me Contact Me + Close Patrick Ellis information modal Patrick Ellis Regional General Manager Serving since 2025 Patrick.Ellis Patrick.Ellis Contact Me Contact Me David Benson Membership Director Contact Me 410-469-8123 Contact Me About David + Close David Benson information modal David Benson Membership Director Serving since 2023 410-469-8123 David.Benson 410-469-8123 David.Benson Contact Me About David David Benson brings many years of Hospitality and Club experience. Most recently, David comes from Arcis Golf, where he served as Sales Director responsible for membership, private events, and tournament sales. His goal as Membership Director here at Eagle’s Nest is to “continue the growth of Membership by building relationships with new guests and most importantly our current Members.” David is thrilled to join the team and help contribute to the outstanding Member experience Eagle’s Nest has to offer Contact Me Close Contact form for technical problems modal Contact form for technical problems.
